Mayor & Aldermen
================

Mayor:
------

### James Monks

Mayor Monks was elected as Mayor in May 2024.

[Email Mayor James Monks](https://www.cityofteaguetx.com/user/971/contact)

### Ron Rasbeary

Alderman Steed was elected to the Teague Board of Aldermen May 2024 and serves in Place I.

[Email Alderman Ron Rasbeary](https://www.cityofteaguetx.com/user/976/contact)

### Jerry Ballew

**Alderman, Place II**

Alderman Ballew was elected to the Teague Board of Aldermen May 2023 and serves in Place II.

[Email Alderman Jerry Ballew](https://www.cityofteaguetx.com/user/776/contact)

### Rhonda Jones

**Alderman, Place III**

Alderman Jones was elected to the Teague Board of Aldermen May 2024 and serves in Place III.

[Email Alderman Rhonda Jones](https://www.cityofteaguetx.com/user/981/contact)

### Bridget Gauntt

**Alderman, Place IV**

Alderman Gauntt was elected to the Teague Board of Aldermen May 2023 and serves in Place IV and Mayor Pro Tempore.

[Email Alderman Bridget Gauntt](https://www.cityofteaguetx.com/user/771/contact)

### Timothy Campbell

**Alderman, Place V / Mayor Pro Tempore**

Alderman Campbell was elected to the Teague Board of Aldermen in May 2023 and serves as Place V.

[Email Alderman Timothy Campbell](https://www.cityofteaguetx.com/user/766/contact)

[Gay Pranger](https://www.cityofteaguetx.com/user/1011/contact)
